comments.body:
Could we add a similar test for `serve`? In the current version of the PR, we get a

```
  File "/Users/aaron/mlflow/mlflow/pyfunc/cli.py", line 49, in _reconstruct_command_line
    raise NotImplementedError('unknown {} arg {} {}'.format(type(val), opt, val))
NotImplementedError: unknown <type 'int'> arg  --port 5000
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +226,230 @@    def test_cli_predict_with_no_conda(self):
        """Run prediction in current conda env"""
        self._cli_predict_with_conda_env(['--no-conda'])
